content.title: Day Care - cum - Recreation Centre and Physiotherapy Unit
content.details: The sub-scheme “Day Care - cum - Recreation Centre and Physiotherapy Unit" under the umbrella scheme "Grant-in-Aid to Pondicherry Society for the Care of the Aged (PONCARE)" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. Through this scheme, the senior citizens are provided free physiotherapy given by the physiotherapist, as advised by the doctors.
benefits: Free Physiotherapy given by the Physiotherapist, as advised by the Doctors.
eligibility: The applicant should be 60 years or above in age.
The applicant should be a Native/Resident of the Union Territory of Puducherry for at least 5 years.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should visit (during office hours) the Pondicherry Society for the care of the Aged (PONCARE), Puducherry, and request the hard copy of the prescribed format of the application form from the staff exclusively entrusted to issue and collect filled-in applications. Fill in all mandatory fields, attach required documents, and submit the application form to The Secretary, PONCARE.
documents_required: Residence-cum-Nativity Certificate, issued by the competent authority.

faqs.question: How long should the applicants have lived in Puducherry to be eligible?
faqs.answer: Applicants should have a minimum residency of 5 years in the Union Territory of Puducherry.

faqs.question: Are there any financial charges for the physiotherapy sessions?
faqs.answer: No, physiotherapy sessions are provided free of charge to eligible senior citizens.

faqs.question: Can non-residents of Puducherry apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, applicants must be native/resident of the Union Territory of Puducherry for at least 5 years.

faqs.question: What is the contact information for PONCARE?
faqs.answer: Reach out to the Secretary at 4th Cross - Sithankudi, 6th Cross Extension, Brindavanam, West, Puducherry - 605 013, or call +91-413-2245317, +91-413-2246318, +91-9443405499.

faqs.question: How is the physiotherapy provided?
faqs.answer: Physiotherapy is administered by qualified physiotherapists based on doctors' recommendations.

faqs.question: What is the age criterion for eligibility?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be 60 years or above to qualify for the sub-scheme.

faqs.question: Who administers the 'Day Care - cum - Recreation Centre and Physiotherapy Unit' sub-scheme?
faqs.answer: The Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry administers the DCCRCPU-GIAPSCA sub-scheme.

faqs.question: What is the official document containing detailed guidelines for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Detailed guidelines for the scheme can be found in the Citizen's Charter at https://socwelfare.py.gov.in/sites/default/files/citizen-charter.pdf.

faqs.question: How can individuals address grievances related to the scheme?
faqs.answer: Grievances can be addressed through the Grievance Redressal portal at https://pgportal.gov.in/.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee?
faqs.answer: No, applicants can rest assured that the entire application process is entirely free of cost.

faqs.question: Is There Any Compensation For The Delay In The Disbursal Of The Scheme Benefits?
faqs.answer: The guidelines do not mention any provision for compensation in the event of delayed disbursement of scheme benefits.

faqs.question: Can Applicants From The Neighboring States/UTs Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is exclusively available to permanent residents of the Puducherry.
